title: MTG, Tucker Carlson urge Trump to stay out of Iran as MAGA rift grows

title: "We now have complete.., control of the skies over Iran" Trump says

title: American Bar Association sues to block Trump's attacks on law firms
shortDescription: The ABA is seeking an order that would bar the White House from pursuing what it called a campaign of intimidation against major law firms.

title: 'Easy target': Trump threatens to kill Iran's supreme leader

title: Iran urges Trump to 'muzzle' Israel in fourth day of air war
shortDescription: Israeli forces stepped up bombing of Iranian cities, while Iran pierced Israeli air defences with a successful volleys of retaliatory missile strikes.

title: Trump orders more ICE deportations in blue cities
shortDescription: President Trump ordered ICE to deliver "the single largest Mass Deportation Program in History" by expanding operations in cities led by Democrats.
